description: George Vidanov and Fernando Lizalde come upon a band of gypsies dancing in the field. George is intrigued by Sandor Lenart-one of the gypsies-and invites him to the estate. Within the stables, George and Sandor engage in mutual body worship. George drops before Sandor's thick cock--sucking it down his throat. Fernando enters, first enjoying the view then eagerly enlisting in the lusty action. Sandor and Fernando take turns feverishly pounding George until all the men release their respective loads.
title: Falcon Crest
